overview: Harry Fitzgibbons is the Managing Director and founder of Top Technology Ventures. His experience includes Director of Hambros Bank with responsibility for US corporate finance and for Hambrosâ€™ portfolio of International unquoted investments. He started Hambros Advance Technology Trust, a VC Fund in the UK and a founder shareholder in Vodafone. Harry was educated at Harvard College and Trinity College, Oxford. He is a graduate of Harvard Law School and served as an officer with the United States Special Forces and with the Department of State, Washington DC.
